alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 5:55PM CDT until March 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Boswell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Antlers... Boswell... Rattan... Soper... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Grant... Ord... Fallon... Apple... Speer... Dela... Unger... Gay... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
